mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (user_id, user_pwd, nickname, contact, email, gender, address, birth, is_active, followers_cnt, following_cnt, created_at, updated_at, user_type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{nickName}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{is_active}, #{followersCnt}, #{followingCnt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{userType})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{userId})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE contact = #{contact})
